# LLM Training Data for Preksha Demo Page

## PRODUCT INFORMATION
Product: Preksha Battery Monitoring System
Company: iRasus Technologies
Location: Gurugram, India
Website: https://irasus.com
Demo Page: https://demo.irasus.com

## TARGET AUDIENCE
- EV Dealers and Distributors
- Fleet Operators (50-500 vehicles)
- Battery Assemblers
- Service Partners
- Small EV OEMs

## KEY FEATURES
1. Works with all BMS types
2. WhatsApp and Excel alerts
3. No engineering expertise required
4. Real-time battery monitoring
5. Warranty dispute resolution with data proof
6. Multi-tenant data privacy
7. Custom reports

## COMMON USE CASES
- Reduce warranty losses by 40%
- Prevent unexpected vehicle breakdowns
- Replace manual Excel/WhatsApp tracking
- Prove battery health to customers
- Scale operations across multiple cities

## DEMO PROCESS
1. Book free 30-minute demo
2. Receive WhatsApp confirmation
3. Schedule convenient time
4. Live screen share demonstration
5. Q&A session
6. Custom setup estimate
